TopicTitle: Let's all take a moment of appreciation.

Articles.Content:
Fellow forum members, let's all take this time to be thankful for all the hard work SQUAD has done, Especially you \*Winks at HarvestR\*

Without them, we wouldn't know each other.

You wouldn't be viewing this thread

We wouldn't be able to think so much in a video game and have fun at the same time

And most important of all...

We would have one special thing missing in our lives.

Let's all think about how lucky we are.

\*Raises Glass\*

***TO SQUAD!***

***TO SQUAD!***

 May the Kraken never strike you!
